title: WTB : Red Cobb raw or fair/good condition
author: Louisville_Hugger

posts.post_title: WTB : Red Cobb raw or fair/good condition
posts.post_content: Looking for a lower grade red Cobb with decent eye appeal. Doesn’t have to be graded. I’d like something without 20 huge creases and half the back or a corner missing.
